summary: A stockbroker on the run from the mob decides to hide out from them by enrolling as a student in high school.

Foley|Andrew S. Herzog|Mike Schutte|Mary B. Erne|Herbert Erne Jr.|Elizabeth A. Bache|Dereck Fulton|David Anthony Higgins|George Whitley|Joe Fagen|Julie Tamisiea
title: Descubierto
